title: Get-to-know your banker! Hello, my name is Kasey and I’m a Teller at Century Bank and Trust in Coldwater...

attachments.displayName:
Get-to-know your banker! Hello, my name is Kasey and I’m a Teller at Century Bank and Trust in Coldwater. I’ve worked in banking for nine months and I love watching comedy’s and my favorite food is chicken- prepared any way!

One of my favorite childhood money memory is actually more of an adult memory. My daughter knows that when she helps me put laundry in the dryer she gets money for helping…. and she helps me a lot…she loves filling up her piggy bank!

object.content:
Get-to-know your banker! Hello, my name is Kasey and I’m a Teller at Century Bank and Trust in Coldwater. I’ve worked in banking for nine months and I love watching comedies and my favorite food is chicken- prepared any way!

One of my favorite childhood money memories is actually more of an adult memory. My daughter knows that when she helps me put laundry in the dryer she gets money for helping…. and she helps me a lot…she loves filling up her piggy bank!
